name: Sticky Hands
description:
You are bored in your office, luckily you came prepared.

Use your sticky hand to have some fun and get by this boring day. You might even be as lucky as to be fired!

This game is made for the Oculus Quest. Use Grip Buttons to grab objects, including the Sticky Hand. Use Trigger while holding the sticky hand to launch the sticky hand further. Use the primary button to bring up the achievements page. Use the secondary button to reset the Sticky Hand.

Complete all 9 achievements to finish the game.

Built By Nikhil Ruia, Christian Cassamajor-Paul, Holden Oliphant, Sophia Liu, Alani Yu
